item.title: Freed British-Egyptian activist not allowed to fly to UK, family says
item.description: Mr Abdel Fattah was Egypt's best known political prisoner until seven weeks ago, when he was released from jail.

item.title: Russian drone slams into block of flats in deadly wave of strikes across Kyiv
item.description: Six areas of the capital are hit, and a further attack on a market in the south kills two others.

item.title: BBC apologises to Trump over Panorama edit but refuses to pay compensation
item.description: Lawyers for the US president have threatened to sue the corporation for $1bn (Â£759m).

item.title: Australian schools shut over asbestos risk in children's sand
item.description: The Australian regulator has recalled several sand products used by children for play, but says the risk from them is "low".

item.title: Swiss hope to slash crippling Trump tariffs after golden charm offensive
item.description: Swiss ministers have had "very positive" talks in Washington, but a private business visit to the Oval Office may have made all the difference.
